termsAndConditions.termsOfuse: By using this service you’re agreeing to the following terms of use.
termsAndConditions.govPrivacy: These include the GOV.UK privacy policy and terms and conditions.

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.managedBy: This service is managed by Her Majesty’s Courts and Tribunals Service and will be referred to as ‘we’ from now on.
whoWeAre.changeInLaw: We may update these terms and conditions if there is a change in the law or to the way the service works.

informationProvided.title: Information provided by this service
informationProvided.support: This service provides information to support you. We can’t give legal advice on individual cases.
informationProvided.questions: You should answer the questions in the service based on your circumstances, and seek legal advice if you need it.

dataStored.title: Where your data is stored
dataStored.dataCentres: Your data will be stored in data centres in the UK. It will be held for 6 months after the last action has been taken on the appeal.
dataStored.notify: We use GOV.UK Notify to send emails. Until the point where emails are handed over to your email provider, they are processed within the European Economic Area. GOV.UK Notify stores your data in data centres in the UK for 1 month.
